Complete theme for ggalign package

Source: R/theme.R
theme_ggalign.Rd

Default theme for heatmap_layout() or stack_layout() object. You can use the option "ggalign.default_theme" to change the default theme.

Usage

theme_ggalign(...)

Arguments

...

Arguments passed on to ggplot2::theme_classic

base_size

base font size, given in pts.

base_family

base font family

base_line_size

base size for line elements

base_rect_size

base size for rect elements

Value

A complete theme object.

Examples

theme_ggalign()
#> List of 136
